categories: Category:Articles known by rank or affiliation

nodes.text: The Earl of Vis was a male earl associated with Vis. He was the cousin of a king of the planet Naboo who ruled prior to the reign of Queen Padmé Amidala, which began in 32 BBY. The earl built a banqueting rotunda in Theed, Naboo's capital city.

The Earl of Vis was first mentioned in canon in the 24th issue of the De Agostini magazine Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon, published in 2015. He was originally mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in the 2000 reference book Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Episode I by Kristin Lund.
